thread.title: WATCH: Anti-gay evangelist is embarrassed on national TV — it’s glorious
thread.title_full: WATCH: Anti-gay evangelist is embarrassed on national TV — it’s glorious

author: Lou Colagiovanni
title: WATCH: Anti-gay evangelist is embarrassed on national TV — it’s glorious
text:
WATCH: Anti-gay evangelist is embarrassed on national TV — it’s glorious September 26, 2015 | Filed under: Politics | Posted by: Lou Colagiovanni 
The anti-gay Christian pastor, Josh Feuerstein, was invited to speak with Mikki Willis, who Feurestein derided for not being masculine enough of an example towards Willis’s children, stumbled through explaining his ignorant understanding of what he believes ‘gender’ to be. The studio audience those upon stage were less than impressed. Watch below. Widgetized Section
